ol.li: Starting the C/D/L, heating up the dryer, threading web, priming the plumbing from the mixing vessel to the Pump and from the Pump to the Slot Die, and finally, beginning coating.
Shutting down the C/D/L and leaving it in a state so that it can easily be restarted for the next batch.

For taking samples, and for periodically recording actual process values to verify that, no important process values have deviated from the setpoints listed on the batch documents provided by the Production Supervisor.

conbody.p: After preliminary trials have been performed to establish exactly how ABC will be operating the machine, it will probably be helpful to write a more concise startup procedure.
